orders.text: Move to the Darbytown road, halt, and defend.
Move to Mechanicsville and then rejoin the division.
After Branch enters or passes thru A15.15, cross at the Meadow Bridges and move to Mechanicsville.
After AP Hill crosses the Chickahominy River, cross and move to Mechanicsville.
After AP Hill crosses the Chickahominy River, cross and move to Mechanicsville.
Move to Shady Grove Road, turn east and move to Hundley's Corners. Halt and await further orders.
Defend the crossing of the White Oak Swamp.
Defend the line of Beaver Dam Creek.
Defend the 5 Corps left flank and prevent a crossing of either the New or Upper Trestle Bridges.
